experiences: Developed scalable web pages for managing warehouses based on Figma specifications using ReactJS, utilizing Spring Boot for microservice changes in backend by following Agile/SDLC methodology for requirements analysis, development, testing, and product release.
Migrated Stockholm’s inbound frontend codebase from AngularJS to Vue.js, implementing a comprehensive overhaul for enhanced functionality and performance.
Added Tailwind and Bootstrap 3 CSS for specific web pages, ensuring responsive and visually appealing UI. Also developed CSS Utility components using Blibli’s internal libraries.

Spearheaded the design and development of a high-availability web application, capable of accommodating over 3k concurrent users and collaborated with cross-functional teams to gather requirements and deliver features that improved user experience and engagement.

Developed comprehensive unit test cases using Jest to ensure code quality and functionality, resulting in improved code reliability and maintainability and also integration test cases with Playwright to validate end-to-end application workflows, enhancing overall testing coverage and reducing bugs in production.
Developed and demonstrated a Proof Of Concept (POC) for designing warehouse layouts using the fabricJS library
Conducted Root Cause Analysis (RCA) for various critical issues, achieving an average resolution time of approximately 2 hours and demonstrating strong proactive problem-solving skills.
Significantly improved code quality, reducing application error rates from 2.5% to 0.5% through continuous refinement.
Conducted thorough code reviews and mentored new interns to foster adherence to best practices.

Implemented a robust UI for monitoring user authentication, enhancing login functionality across internal team projects such as Pagebook, Quora, and KBC. This initiative ensured a cohesive and secure user experience, managed centrally by the Common Infra Management microservice.
Developed an e-commerce application named CommerceNest using VueJS and Spring Boot, enabling users to place orders and checkout for desired purchases.
Transitioned from internship to working on B2B domains of e-commerce leveraging prior experience to contribute effectively to project development and execution.
Gained proficiency in the Django framework, focusing on the integration between frontend and backend applications.

Developed a secure online voting application using the Django framework, allowing users to vote for specific candidates. Utilized MySQL for efficient data storage and management, ensuring a seamless user experience.
